title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
The response can earn up to 3 points:

2 point: For f''(x)

1 point: For correct answer with reason

f''(x) = ex + (x - 3)ex = (x - 2)ex

f''(x) > 0 for x > 2

f'(x) < 0 for 0 < x < 3

Therefore, the graph of f is both decreasing and concave up on the interval 2 < x < 3.
